review: While this product seems well conceived and easy to use, it is not at all suitable for older HDTV sets, a fact that is not advertised clearly in the product information.  Do not buy this, for instance, if your only way of connecting is a DVI slot.  Even with an HDMI-DVI cable this product will not work properly, delivering exceptionally poor picture quality and nothing but interference for sound.  Amazon's technical support staff were candid that the Fire TV unit was not compatible with older TVs, but, again, this fact was not at all clear from the product information online.
